BTFramework comments
Comments made in context of the BTFramework steering group at Library of Congress
In the development of MODS LC found that in some contexts it's essential to separate a main item associated with the creative work. In MODS this became the principal or primary name. Note the conflation of person & family here. RDA makes that distinction.
In MODS this became just a name, but not the principal or primary name.
Can use MARC relators or FRBR-defined relationships to clarify the nature of the relationships
We might have to consider publication statement, which is basically focus on the event associated with publication, rather than the entity. So this could be called "publication".
----
